name: fib-interval
description: setInterval using a series of incrementing Fibonacci durations

scripts.build: npm install && mkdir -p ./dist && rm -rf ./dist/* && browserify index.js -s fibInterval -o ./dist/fibInterval.js && (cd ./dist && uglifyjs fibInterval.js -c -m -o fibInterval.min.js --source-map fibInterval.min.map)
scripts.test: npm install && npm run lint && tap test.js --coverage-report=text

author: Buster Collings <busterc@gmail.com> (https://about.me/buster)
